name: jssm
description: A Javascript finite state machine (FSM) with a terse DSL and a simple API. Well tested, and typed with Flowtype. MIT License.

scripts.test: npm run make && npm run justtest
scripts.justtest: cp dist/jssm.es5.cjs.js build && nyc ava src/js/tests/*.js -v && npm run nyc-html
scripts.removedir: rm -rf build && rm -rf dist && rm -rf docs
scripts.createdir: mkdir build && mkdir dist && mkdir docs
scripts.clean: npm run removedir && npm run rmgenerated && npm run createdir
scripts.peg: rm -f src/js/jssm-dot.js && pegjs src/js/jssm-dot.peg && node src/buildjs/fixparser.js && rm src/js/jssm-dot.js
scripts.make: npm run clean && npm run makever && npm run peg && npm run typescript && npm run make_iife && npm run make_cjs && npm run minify && npm run min_iife && npm run min_cjs
scripts.audit: text_audit -t major wasteful any mixed fixme checkme testme stochable todo comeback whargarbl
scripts.vet: npm run eslint && npm run audit
scripts.build: npm run vet && npm run test && npm run docs && npm run site && npm run dist && rm -f src/js/jssm-dot.ts
scripts.minify: mv dist/es6/jssm-dot.js dist/es6/jssm-dot.nonmin.js && terser dist/es6/jssm-dot.nonmin.js > dist/es6/jssm-dot.js
scripts.min_iife: mv dist/jssm.es5.iife.js dist/jssm.es5.iife.nonmin.js && terser dist/jssm.es5.iife.nonmin.js > dist/jssm.es5.iife.js
scripts.min_cjs: mv dist/jssm.es5.cjs.js dist/jssm.es5.cjs.nonmin.js && terser dist/jssm.es5.cjs.nonmin.js > dist/jssm.es5.cjs.js
scripts.docs: documentation build src/js/** -f html -o docs/lib && npm run changelog
scripts.githubaction: npm run build && npm run coverage

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
